Texts.Chs: 可以把空气凝结成有用的反应物的装置。^cyan;需要^orange;15W^cyan;电力^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Condenses the atmosphere into usable reagents. Requires 15W of power.

Texts.Chs: 对空气的干预，这让我感觉不太好。
Texts.Eng: I don't feel too good about the prospect of meddling with the atmosphere.

Texts.Chs: 这几乎就像魔术师的伎俩，从字面上看得出是说从稀薄的空气里提取资源。
Texts.Eng: It's almost like a magician's trick, pulling resources out of literal thin air.

Texts.Chs: 让我..找到大..凝器！ 我是不是说的太快了？
Texts.Eng: Let's find the mega condenser! Am I saying that too fast?
Perhaps this could pull oxidizers out of the air. I hate rusting.

Texts.Chs: 停止偷偷偷空气！叶族人正在使用！
Texts.Eng: Ssstop ssstealing the air! Floran isss usssing that!

Texts.Chs: 从空气中能制造出海这绝对是在发疯。
Texts.Eng: To pull an ocean out of thin air is just plain madness.
Would this be able to pull from my body? I hope not...
